AttributeDefinition.name: USER_ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: ID of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: USER_NAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: USER_MODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Mode of the user: 'LOCAL', 'GLOBAL', 'EXTERNAL'

AttributeDefinition.name: CREATOR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Creator of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: VALID_FROM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specify a date time from which the user account is valid.

AttributeDefinition.name: VALID_UNTIL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specify a date time until which the user account is valid.

AttributeDefinition.name: IS_RESTRICTED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies if the user is a restricted user

AttributeDefinition.name: IS_CLIENT_CONNECT_ENABLED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies if the user is able to connect to client

AttributeDefinition.name: HAS_REMOTE_USERS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies if there is a database user in another tenant database as the remote identity of the database user.

AttributeDefinition.name: SESSION_CLIENT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the client whose data can be accessed by user

AttributeDefinition.name: EMAIL_ADDRESS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email address of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: TIME_ZONE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time zone of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHENTICATION_TYPE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Different Authentication methods supported by user

AttributeDefinition.name: SYSTEM_PRIVILEGES
AttributeDefinition.Description: System Privileges assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: APPLICATION_PRIVILEGES
AttributeDefinition.Description: Application Privileges assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: CATALOG_ROLES
AttributeDefinition.Description: Catalog Roles assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: REPOSITORY_ROLES
AttributeDefinition.Description: Repository Roles assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: FORCE_PWD_CHG_ON_NEXT_LOGON
AttributeDefinition.Description: If value is "YES", the password is set in initial mode else it is set in permanent mode

AttributeDefinition.name: ROLE_NAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Role name

AttributeDefinition.name: ROLE_ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Role ID

AttributeDefinition.name: ROLE_MODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Mode of the role: 'LOCAL'

AttributeDefinition.name: GLOBAL_IDENTITY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identity specified for role with ROLE_MODE GLOBAL

AttributeDefinition.name: CREATOR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the user who created the role

AttributeDefinition.name: GRANTED_ROLES
AttributeDefinition.Description: The roles which are assigned to the current role

AttributeDefinition.name: ROLE_NAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Role name

AttributeDefinition.name: ROLE_ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Role ID

AttributeDefinition.name: ROLE_MODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Mode of the role: 'LOCAL'

AttributeDefinition.name: GLOBAL_IDENTITY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identity specified for role with ROLE_MODE GLOBAL

AttributeDefinition.name: CREATOR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the user who created the role

AttributeDefinition.name: GRANTED_ROLES
AttributeDefinition.Description: The roles which are assigned to the current role
